statements: SELECT * FROM customer_information;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_information ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_email FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_address FROM customer_information WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_information;
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE customer_address='New York';
SELECT customer_name FROM customer_information ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id > 100 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_email FROM customer_information WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE address='123 Main St';
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name='Alice';
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN marketing_campaigns ON customers.customer_id = marketing_campaigns.campaign_id;
SELECT name, address FROM customers WHERE address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_amount FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT c.name, o.order_date, o.total_amount FROM Customers c JOIN Orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id ORDER BY o.total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date < '2022-05-01' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id;

SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT DISTINCT city FROM addresses ORDER BY city DESC;
